author: dapplion
content: One usecase I can imagine is a lightclient wanting to have faster access to a recent syncaggregate than with the current routes available, which have a delay of 4/3 slots. With that route, connecting to a beacon node subscribe to all sync subnets you can get a good sync aggregate 1/3 into the slot
